modName: How to make collision in nif file - Skyrim
summary: How to make collision in nif file (Skyrim)
descriptionHtml:
This is my tutorial showing how to make collision in nif file (Skyrim).
It is about only collisions of simple meshes.

Archive contains:
- guidebook in pdf file
- video tutorial in mkv file
- \"Test file.max\" (with textures) as file for testing - it\'s file before exporting
- \"Test file.nif\" as file for testing - it\'s exported model from \"Test file.max\" (before editing in NifSkope)
- \"Test model.nif\" as file for testing - it\'s exported and edited in NifSkope model (as base/original not from game file, this file can be used as \"mother\" for your completely new models)
- \"Model ready to prepare for importing into game.nif\" as file for testing - it\'s edited in NifSkope model from \"Test file.nif\" (you have to prepare this file to import into game follow tutorial: \"How to prepare nif file to import into Skyrim\")

You may also watch my video tutorial on YouTube.

How to import nif file to 3dsMax - Skyrim - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11642
How to export nif file from 3ds Max - Skyrim - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11677 
How to prepare nif file to import into Skyrim - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11793

Credits:
theru - for inspiration of his tutorial (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10222)
author: starjacker0
